constraints.name: recurrence_relation
constraints.description: 序列中的每个元素由前三个元素的线性组合决定，具体为 a_i = (a_{i-1} + 2*a_{i-2} + 3*a_{i-3}) % mod

constraints.name: initial_conditions
constraints.description: 序列的初始条件为 a_1 = 1, a_2 = 1, a_3 = 2

constraints.name: modular_arithmetic
constraints.description: 所有计算结果需要对 mod 取模，其中 mod = 10^9 + 7
